name: 哈丽特·塔布曼
bio: 生为奴隶，1849年孤身逃往北方后，13次潜回南方，通过'地下铁路'帮助约70名奴隶逃往自由。她随身携带手枪——不是为了对付追捕者，而是警告想要回头的逃亡者。内战期间担任联邦军间谍和侦察兵，是美国历史上第一位领导武装突袭的女性。
bio_en: Escaped slave who became the most famous conductor on the Underground Railroad, making 13 missions to rescue approximately 70 enslaved people. During the Civil War, she served as a scout, spy, and nurse for the Union Army. The first woman to lead an armed assault during the war. A lifelong activist for abolition and women's suffrage.

personalEvents.title: 逃出奴役
personalEvents.description: 独自从马里兰逃往费城，步行近90英里
personalEvents.description_en: Escaped alone from Maryland to Philadelphia, walking nearly 90 miles

personalEvents.title: 首次返回救人
personalEvents.description: 《逃奴法》通过后，冒死返回马里兰营救家人
personalEvents.description_en: After the Fugitive Slave Act passed, risked her life returning to Maryland to rescue family members

personalEvents.title: 与道格拉斯会面
personalEvents.description: 在地下铁路网络中与弗雷德里克·道格拉斯合作
personalEvents.description_en: Collaborated with Frederick Douglass in the Underground Railroad network

personalEvents.title: 领导军事行动
personalEvents.description: 在南卡罗来纳领导康巴希河突袭，解放700余名奴隶
personalEvents.description_en: Led the Combahee River Raid in South Carolina, liberating over 700 enslaved people

personalEvents.title: 加入女权运动
personalEvents.description: 在废奴之后转向争取女性投票权
personalEvents.description_en: After abolition, turned her efforts to fighting for women's voting rights
